title-part.text: FIRE-FIGHTING

reference.text: fire-extinguishing compositions, use of chemical substances in extinguishing fires A62D1/00; spraying, applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces in general B05; alarm arrangements G08B, e.g. fire alarms actuated by smoke or gases G08B17/10

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Fire prevention or containment

reference.text: A62C3/00 takes precedence; flame traps A62C4/00

title-part.text: Removing or cutting-off the supply of inflammable material
Physical fire-barriers

CPC-specific-text.text: having as the main closure device materials, whose characteristics undergo an irreversible change under high temperatures, e.g. intumescent

reference.text: intumescent materials forming part of the mechanism of another main closure device, see the relevant class

title-part.text: Water curtains
Fire-proof curtains
Hinged dampers
with two or more blades
multi-vane roll or fold-up type
Sliding dampers
at 90 degrees to the plane of the opening
Fire-dampers with provision for the removal of an obstacle, e.g. rails, conveyors, before closing the opening
Operating or controlling mechanisms

reference.text: emergency operation of doors and windows E05F1/002, E05F15/72

with fusible links
with frangible elements
with thermostatic elements, e.g. bimetallic, resettable actuators
having non-mechanical actuators
electric
pneumatic

CPC-specific-text.text: Accessories

title-part.text: Fire-fighting vehicles

reference.text: A62C31/00, A62C33/00, A62C37/00 take precedence; vehicle aspects, see the appropriate subclasses of B60 - B64, e.g. fire-fighting aircraft B64D1/16

title-part.text: Fire-fighting land vehicles
Fire-fighting vessels or like floating structures

joints or couplings therefor

with two or more outlets

title-part.text: with containers for delivering the extinguishing substance

title-part.text: Swingable or tiltable containers
Containers destroyed or opened by falling
Containers destroyed or opened by bursting charge

note.note-paragraph:
Group A62C35/08 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A62C37/28.
Groups A62C37/28 and A62C35/08 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Containers destroyed or opened by flames or heat

Group A62C37/08 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A62C37/28.
Groups A62C37/28 and A62C37/08 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Releasing means, e.g. electrically released
heat-sensitive

CPC-specific-text.text: with an explosive charge

note.note-paragraph:
Group A62C37/28 is no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2018-08-01. The content of this group is being reclassified into groups A62C35/08, A62C37/08, and A62C37/36.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: an actuating signal being generated by a sensor separate from an outlet device

note.note-paragraph:
Group A62C37/36 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group A62C37/28.
Groups A62C37/28 and A62C37/36 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: by both sensor and actuator, e.g. valve, being in the danger zone
with electric connection between sensor and actuator
with mechanical connection between sensor and actuator, e.g. rods, levers
only the sensor being in the danger zone
Construction of the actuator
Thermally sensitive initiators
Testing or indicating devices for determining the state of readiness of the equipment
Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass

CPC-specific-text.text: Methods of extinguishing or preventing the spread of fire by cooling down or suffocating the flames
using gases or vapours that do not support combustion, e.g. steam, carbon dioxide

using foam
using solid substances, e.g. sand, ashes; using substances forming a crust
using counter-fire
with simultaneous removal of inflammable materials
using sprayed or atomised water

Methods or equipment not provided for in groups A62C99/0009 - A62C99/0081
